alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 28 at 2:41PM MST until January 30 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SUNDAY TO NOON MST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills 20 below to 30 below zero. * WHERE...Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, and Fort Hall. * WHEN...From 6 PM Sunday to noon MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...New snow this evening and overnight should total less than 2 inches, therefore the Winter Weather Advisory has been cancelled.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
